plot: The Joneses engage in a gripping journey; Archie faces criminal consequences; Betty unpacks a string of shocking revelations about Evelyn.

When Jellybean goes missing, Jughead, Gladys and FP follow a series of cryptic clues to get her home. Elsewhere, Archie faces the fallout from his latest boxing match, while Betty makes a major discovery about Evelyn's past. Finally, Josie makes a big decision about her future.—sarah_l91

With Jellybean's life endangered by the Gargoyle King, the Joneses must put all morals aside to complete a daring quest. Secrets come out and an old enemy resurfaces. Archie faces criminal consequences for his latest boxing match as Elio sets him up to take the fall as the "Riverdale Reaper." Betty investigates Evelyn's past and unpacks a series of revelations about Evelyn and The Farm, leading to a frightening confrontation. Josie makes a big decision about her future career.—snowflakeaudrey
